name: pmd-starterpack
description: Complete Front-End workflow with Webpack, Babel, PostCss and real php Twig
author: PrismaMedia

scripts.font:
### Build icon-font
    dcs-icon-font --icons './src/assets/fonts/svg/**/*.svg' --out $npm_package_config_fontRoute --fontname TEL --baseclass icon --classprefix icon- --cssTemplate $npm_package_config_fontRoute/font.hbs --cssDest $npm_package_config_staticRoute/assets/styles/ --cssFontsUrl ../fonts/TEL/
scripts.build:webpack:
### Build all other assets (js, css, images)
    webpack --progress --colors --config webpack.prod.config.js
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:webpack
scripts.test:
### Lint your JS and CSS files
    npm run test:eslint && npm run test:stylelint
scripts.test:format:
### Try to format your JS and CSS files
    npm run test:eslintfmt && npm run test:stylelfmt
scripts.test:eslintfmt:
### Format JS files with ESlint
    eslint -c .eslintrc --fix ./src/ || true
scripts.start:
### Launch server and start watching files
    node server
scripts.start:open:
### Start the server, watch for file changes and open your default browser
    node server open
